info.title: Koupii LMS API
info.description: API documentation for English course LMS

post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token
Revokes the user's current access token

get.description: Redirects the user to Google's OAuth consent screen
Handles the callback from Google OAuth and authenticates the user
Redirects the user to Facebook's OAuth consent screen
Handles the callback from Facebook OAuth and authenticates the user

post.description: Registers a user and returns an access token

get.description: Admin & Student can see all classes, Teacher can only see their own classes.

post.description: Only admin and teacher can create a new class.

409.description: Class name or code already exists

get.description: Get class detail including teacher info.

post.description: Only admin and teacher (class owner) can update class data.

parameters.name: _method
parameters.description: Override HTTP method for PATCH requests

409.description: Class name or code already exists

delete.description: Only admin and teacher (class owner) can delete a class.

get.summary: Get all enrollments based on user role
get.description: Admin sees all enrollments, teacher sees only enrollments in their classes, student sees only their enrolled classes.

post.description: Student enrolls to a class using class_id and class_code.

422.description: Invalid class code or validation error

get.description: Show enrollment details including class and student info.

patch.description: Admin, teacher, or student can update enrollment (depends on role).

delete.description: Admin, teacher, or student can delete enrollment based on role authorization.

get.summary: Get all invitations based on user role
get.description: Admin sees all invitations, teacher sees only invitations in their classes, student sees only invitations sent to them.

post.description: Teacher or admin sends an invitation to a student to join a class.

409.description: Student already enrolled or invitation already sent

patch.description: Student accepts or declines the invitation.

delete.description: Teacher or admin deletes the invitation before it is accepted or declined.

get.description: Retrieve reading tests based on user role. Admin sees all tests, students see only published tests, teachers see only their own tests.

post.description: Create a new reading test with passages and questions.

get.description: Retrieve a specific reading test with all its passages and questions.

404.description: Test not found or unauthorized access

put.description: Update an existing reading test. Only the creator or admin can update.

delete.description: Delete a specific passage from a reading test.
Delete a specific question from a reading test. May also delete the question group if it becomes empty.
Delete an entire reading test including all passages, questions, and associated images. Only the creator or admin can delete.

patch.description: Change the authenticated user's password. Requires the current password and a new one. CSRF protection via XSRF-TOKEN and Referer header.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

new_password: The new password must be at least 8 characters.

get.description: Retrieve profile information for the authenticated user.
Retrieve public details of a user by their ID.

post.description: Update authenticated user's profile including name, email, role, avatar, and bio.

parameters.name: _method
parameters.description: Override HTTP method for PATCH requests

delete.description: Delete the authenticated user's account, including avatar file if present.

get.description: Returns a list of all vocabulary categories.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

post.description: Adds a new vocabulary category. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific category by its ID.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

delete.description: Delete a category by its UUID.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

patch.description: Update a vocabulary category's name or description.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

get.description: Returns a list of all vocabulary entries.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

post.description: Adds a new vocabulary entry to the system.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

get.description: Retrieve details of a vocabulary entry by its ID.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

parameters.name: _method
parameters.description: Override HTTP method for PATCH requests

delete.description: Deletes a vocabulary entry by its UUID.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

post.description: Toggle the bookmark status of a vocabulary entry for the authenticated user.

parameters.name: Referer
parameters.description: Referring URL Frontend for CSRF protection

get.description: Retrieve writing tests based on user role. Admin sees all tests, students see only published tests, teachers see only their own tests.

description.example: Test for academic essay writing skills

post.description: Create a new writing test with prompts and evaluation criteria. Only admins and teachers can create tests.

description.example: A comprehensive test for academic essay writing skills

prompt_text.example: Some people believe that technology has made our lives easier. Others think it has made life more complicated. Discuss both views and give your opinion.

instructions.example: Write a clear, well-structured essay with introduction, body paragraphs, and conclusion.

description.example: Relevance, development, and support of ideas

403.description: Forbidden - Only admins and teachers can create tests

get.description: Retrieve a specific writing test with all its prompts and criteria.

404.description: Test not found or unauthorized access

delete.description: Delete an entire writing test including all prompts and criteria. Only the creator or admin can delete.

patch.description: Update an existing writing test. Only the creator or admin can update.

delete.description: Delete a specific writing prompt from a test. Only the test creator or admin can delete.
